array.string: SD_USERNAME="username" SD_PASSWORD_SHA1="0000000000000000000000000000000000000000" SD_LINEUP="USA-MA02317-X" PATH=/opt/local/bin:$PATH ; /bin/mkdir -p "$HOME/Library/Application Support/sd-py" ; /usr/bin/cd "$HOME/Library/Application Support/sd-py" ; "$HOME/bin/sd_json.py" -u $SD_USERNAME -p $SD_PASSWORD_SHA1 -l $SD_LINEUP 1> xmltv.log 2>&1 ; /usr/bin/open -a EyeTV "$HOME/Library/Application Support/sd-py/xmltv.xml"
